author: aandvalenzuela
body: `CXXMODULE` iB fails when applying this patch. After checking it, I think it might not be needed anymore (See https://github.com/cms-sw/root/blob/cms/master/94b3064bb5/interpreter/cling/include/cling/std.modulemap#L376-L380)
title: [CXXMODULE] Remove root_12193 patch for rootmodule
